La_Mirada.La Palma Intercommunity Hospital: La Palma Intercommunity Hospital (LPH) is a 141 bed acute care facility in La Palma, California, USA. LPH is owned and operated by Prime Healthcare Services (PHS), a hospital management company located in Victorville. PHS was founded in 2001 by Prem Reddy, who acts as its present Chairman of the Board. PHS has operated La Palma Intercommunity Hospital since 2006.
